name: Color Blind Game 色盲遊戲
name_original: Color Blind Game 色盲遊戲
description:
Color Blind is a simple game where your objective is to click on the different shade of color in a short period of time. Once you find the different shade, you click it and score one point if it is the different one. There is a time limit for each level, so you need to find the different one fastly and correctly, that requires user's attention, observation, and analysis power.


There are 3 mode, normal mode, hard mode and crazy mode.
Normal mode that starts from 2*2 --> 10*10 blocks.
Hard mode starts from 6*6 --> 10*10 blocks.
Crazy mode that generate random of blocks in every level.
Chaos mode that generate random of blocks and shape in every level
